ayahs.textUthmani: وَأَسِرُّوا۟ قَوْلَكُمْ أَوِ ٱجْهَرُوا۟ بِهِۦٓ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَأَسِرُّوا۟ [And conceal] قَوْلَكُمْ [your speech] أَوِ [or] ٱجْهَرُوا۟ [proclaim] بِهِۦٓ ۖ [it] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, He] عَلِيمٌۢ [(is the) All-Knower] بِذَاتِ [of what (is in)] ٱلصُّدُورِ [the breasts]
ayahs.transliteration: Waasirroo qawlakum awi ijharoo bihi innahuAAaleemun bithati assudoor

ayahs.textUthmani: أَلَا يَعْلَمُ مَنْ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَلَا [Does not] يَعْلَمُ [know] مَنْ [(the One) Who] خَلَقَ [created] وَهُوَ [And He] ٱللَّطِيفُ [(is) the Subtle] ٱلْخَبِيرُ [the All-Aware]
ayahs.transliteration: Ala yaAAlamu man khalaqa wahuwa allateefualkhabeer

ayahs.textUthmani: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ ذَلُولًا فَٱمْشُوا۟ فِى مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُوا۟ مِن رِّزْقِهِۦ ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ ٱلنُّشُورُ
ayahs.wordByWord: هُوَ [He] ٱلَّذِى [(is) the One Who] جَعَلَ [made] لَكُمُ [for you] ٱلْأَرْضَ [the earth] ذَلُولًۭا [subservient] فَٱمْشُوا۟ [so walk] فِى [in] مَنَاكِبِهَا [(the) paths thereof] وَكُلُوا۟ [and eat] مِن [of] رِّزْقِهِۦ ۖ [His provision] وَإِلَيْهِ [and to Him] ٱلنُّشُورُ [(is) the Resurrection]
ayahs.transliteration: Huwa allathee jaAAala lakumu al-ardathaloolan famshoo fee manakibihawakuloo min rizqihi wa-ilayhi annushoor

ayahs.textUthmani: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخْسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَمُورُ
ayahs.wordByWord: ءَأَمِنتُم [Do you feel secure] مَّن [(from Him) Who] فِى [(is) in] ٱلسَّمَآءِ [the heaven] أَن [not] يَخْسِفَ [He will cause to swallow] بِكُمُ [you] ٱلْأَرْضَ [the earth] فَإِذَا [when] هِىَ [it] تَمُورُ [sways]
ayahs.transliteration: Aamintum man fee assama-i anyakhsifa bikumu al-arda fa-itha hiya tamoor

ayahs.textUthmani: أَمْ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرْسِلَ عَلَيْكُمْ حَاصِبًا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ كَيْفَ نَذِيرِ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] أَمِنتُم [do you feel secure] مَّن [(from Him) Who] فِى [(is) in] ٱلسَّمَآءِ [the heaven] أَن [that] يُرْسِلَ [He will send] عَلَيْكُمْ [against you] حَاصِبًۭا ۖ [a storm of stones] فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ [Then you would know] كَيْفَ [how] نَذِيرِ [(was) My warning]
ayahs.transliteration: Am amintum man fee assama-ian yursila AAalaykum hasiban fasataAAlamoona kayfa natheer

ayahs.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And indeed] كَذَّبَ [denied] ٱلَّذِينَ [those] مِن [from] قَبْلِهِمْ [before them] فَكَيْفَ [and how] كَانَ [was] نَكِيرِ [My rejection]
ayahs.transliteration: Walaqad kaththaba allatheenamin qablihim fakayfa kana nakeer

ayahs.textUthmani: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلطَّيْرِ فَوْقَهُمْ صَـٰٓفَّـٰتٍ وَيَقْبِضْنَ ۚ مَا يُمْسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍۭ بَصِيرٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَوَلَمْ [Do not] يَرَوْا۟ [they see] إِلَى [[to]] ٱلطَّيْرِ [the birds] فَوْقَهُمْ [above them] صَـٰٓفَّـٰتٍۢ [spreading (their wings)] وَيَقْبِضْنَ ۚ [and folding] مَا [Not] يُمْسِكُهُنَّ [holds them] إِلَّا [except] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ۚ [the Most Gracious] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, He] بِكُلِّ [(is) of every] شَىْءٍۭ [thing] بَصِيرٌ [All-Seer]
ayahs.transliteration: Awa lam yaraw ila attayrifawqahum saffatin wayaqbidna mayumsikuhunna illa arrahmanu innahubikulli shay-in baseer

ayahs.textUthmani: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى هُوَ جُندٌ لَّكُمْ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۚ إِنِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ إِلَّا فِى غُرُورٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَمَّنْ [Who is] هَـٰذَا [this] ٱلَّذِى [the one] هُوَ [he] جُندٌۭ [(is) an army] لَّكُمْ [for you] يَنصُرُكُم [to help you] مِّن [from] دُونِ [besides] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۚ [the Most Gracious] إِنِ [Not] ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ [(are) the disbelievers] إِلَّا [but] فِى [in] غُرُورٍ [delusion]
ayahs.transliteration: Amman hatha allathee huwajundun lakum yansurukum min dooni arrahmaniini alkafiroona illa fee ghuroor

ayahs.textUthmani: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى يَرْزُقُكُمْ إِنْ أَمْسَكَ رِزْقَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّجُّوا۟ فِى عُتُوٍّ وَنُفُورٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَمَّنْ [Who is] هَـٰذَا [this] ٱلَّذِى [the one] يَرْزُقُكُمْ [to provide you] إِنْ [if] أَمْسَكَ [He withheld] رِزْقَهُۥ ۚ [His provision] بَل [Nay] لَّجُّوا۟ [they persist] فِى [in] عُتُوٍّۢ [pride] وَنُفُورٍ [and aversion]
ayahs.transliteration: Amman hatha allatheeyarzuqukum in amsaka rizqahu bal lajjoo fee AAutuwwin wanufoor

ayahs.textUthmani: أَفَمَن يَمْشِى مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَجْهِهِۦٓ أَهْدَىٰٓ أَمَّن يَمْشِى سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَفَمَن [Then is he who] يَمْشِى [walks] مُكِبًّا [fallen] عَلَىٰ [on] وَجْهِهِۦٓ [his face] أَهْدَىٰٓ [better guided] أَمَّن [or (he) who] يَمْشِى [walks] سَوِيًّا [upright] عَلَىٰ [on] صِرَٰطٍۢ [(the) Path] مُّسْتَقِيمٍۢ [Straight]
ayahs.transliteration: Afaman yamshee mukibban AAala wajhihiahda amman yamshee sawiyyan AAala siratinmustaqeem

ayahs.textUthmani: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَكُمْ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۖ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] هُوَ [He] ٱلَّذِىٓ [(is) the One Who] أَنشَأَكُمْ [produced you] وَجَعَلَ [and made] لَكُمُ [for you] ٱلسَّمْعَ [the hearing] وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ [and the vision] وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۖ [and the feelings] قَلِيلًۭا [Little] مَّا [(is) what] تَشْكُرُونَ [you give thanks]
ayahs.transliteration: Qul huwa allathee anshaakum wajaAAalalakumu assamAAa wal-absara wal-af-idataqaleelan ma tashkuroon

ayahs.textUthmani: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] هُوَ [He] ٱلَّذِى [(is) the One Who] ذَرَأَكُمْ [multiplied you] فِى [in] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the earth] وَإِلَيْهِ [and to Him] تُحْشَرُونَ [you will be gathered]
ayahs.transliteration: Qul huwa allathee tharaakumfee al-ardi wa-ilayhi tuhsharoon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَيَقُولُونَ [And they say] مَتَىٰ [When] هَـٰذَا [(is) this] ٱلْوَعْدُ [promise] إِن [if] كُنتُمْ [you are] صَـٰدِقِينَ [truthful]
ayahs.transliteration: Wayaqooloona mata hathaalwaAAdu in kuntum sadiqeen

ayahs.textUthmani: قُلْ إِنَّمَا ٱلْعِلْمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] إِنَّمَا [Only] ٱلْعِلْمُ [the knowledge] عِندَ [(is) with] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] وَإِنَّمَآ [and only] أَنَا۠ [I am] نَذِيرٌۭ [a warner] مُّبِينٌۭ [clear]
ayahs.transliteration: Qul innama alAAilmu AAinda Allahiwa-innama ana natheerun mubeen
